game.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 뺏고 빼앗고 다시 되찾아라! “토지”를 제패하는 자, 천하를 제패한다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Triumph over the land, take charge of the fate of China! Conquer territories and fly your colors!

reviewHighlights.text: Editor DLC for Specaility Items does not work.
It's an entertaining game. The price tag is bs.
